settings.title: The Idea
settings.text: Clouded Leopard gin, launched in 2019, is the brainchild of chef and gastropub owner Will Phillips, who set about creating his own gin brand in honour and support of the clouded leopard, a beautiful and elusive animal in grave danger of extinction and rarely seen in the wild.

settings.subtitle: Helping to save the clouded leopard
settings.text: As a lover of both gin and wildlife – in particular cats, big and small – Will was inspired to use his expertise in combining delectable tastes to create this premium full-flavoured gin, while helping to save a magnificent animal. Fifteen per cent of profits from every bottle sold is donated to the Born Free Foundation, which works to protect leopards from the threats they face in the wild and rescues them from lives of misery and exploitation in captivity by rehoming them in spacious sanctuaries surrounded by their natural habitat.

settings.title: "The clouded leopard is a beautiful and elusive animal with huge paws and a chunky long tail that makes him a great climber of trees. I really want to help save this fantastic animal in its natural habitat, and riding the crest of the gin wave seems like an ideal place to start."
Creating The Gin
settings.text: Besides being an enthusiastic gin drinker, Will is well versed in what ingredients marry well together, having worked in the food sector for many years. He started experimenting with different botanicals during a summer heatwave, a climate similar to India and Southern Asia. The quality and provenance of the core ingredients was key, so he started playing with fruits such as mangos, and black pepper sourced from Southeast Asia, the home of the clouded leopard.

settings.subtitle: THE RESULT
settings.text:
The result is this delicious dry gin infused with flavours of lemon zest, ripe mango and black pepper – the perfect drink with Premium Indian Tonic Water from our partners at Fever-Tree.

The signature Clouded Leopard bottle and packaging were designed by Sarah Rock. The cat illustration is by Jonathan Gibbs, created with a traditional screen-printing technique.

Sarah Rock is a graphic designer and art director with more than 20 years' experience. Having worked in London for most of her career in illustrated book publishing, she now lives in Bath where she works for a homewares company, and is crazy about everything to do with food and drink.

settings.title: Clouded Leopard is produced from British wheat spirit using one-shot distillation on 30-litre copper pot stills. The botanicals – juniper berries, coriander seeds, angelica root, cassia bark, mango, black pepper and lemon zest – are macerated for 24 hours before distillation.
